channel.title: Error!help!
channel.description:
this is what it says when i run the server, the server runs but i cant get on it, when i log on i immediatly lose connection, and this seems to be the problem any1 kno how to fix it??
[code]Starting sk8terskape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:31) [/code]
